desc: Buy Pilates Reformers and Pilates equipment from the most prestigious manufacturers. Pilates Reformers Direct features the lowest prices and best customer service. The WHITE GLOVE SERVICE® by experienced and trained staff assures the exceptional in-home delivery and assembly of your Pilates home studio or equipment.

layout.text: Professional staff provides for the exceptional convenience of Unpacking and Assembly of your new Pilates Equipment for your Home or Studio.
